attributes.action: YES FOR BULGARIAN, YES FOR ROMANIAN !
attributes.additional_details:
I am calling upon all decent human being. We need your vote to stop the scaremongering which they are asking you to discriminate against the Bulgarian and Romanian people . You should stand up and be  counted. The Bulgarian and Romanian people they are decent and proud people, hard working with European value and traditions and they need your vote to stop those who like to divide Europa and abuse their fellow European. More over the Bulgarian and Romanian people they contribute greatly to the future prosperity of UK and you have to be aware they will not only help by their productivity but also they will help into supporting the pension system in the long run.
... When they locked up the social democrats,/ I remained silent;/ I was not a social democrat./ When they came for the trade unionists, / I did not speak out; /I was not a trade unionist. / When they came for the Jews, / I remained silent; / I wasn't a Jew. / When they came for me, / there was no one left to speak out.
